mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB_MISSION` mission, `t_club` club WHERE mission.`mission_id` = #{meetingId} AND mission.`TYPE` = 2 AND mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND mission.`club_id` = club.`club_id`
SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB_MISSION` club_mission, `T_CLUB` club WHERE club_mission.`CLUB_ID` = club.`club_id` AND club_mission.`IS_DEl` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 2 AND club.`club_id` = #{clubId}

SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB_MISSION` club_mission, `T_STUDENT_MISSION_RELATION` student_mission, `T_STUDENT` student WHERE club_mission.`mission_id` = student_mission.`MISSION_ID` AND club_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND student_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 2 AND student.`student_id` = club_mission.`SPONSOR_ID` AND student_mission.`STUDENT_ID` = #{studentId} AND club_mission.`club_id` = #{clubId}

SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB_MISSION` club_mission, `T_SCHOOL` school, `T_CLUB` club WHERE club_mission.`CLUB_ID` = club.`club_id` AND club.`SCHOOL_ID` = school.`school_id` AND club_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 2 AND school.`school_id` = #{schoolId}

SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB_MISSION` club_mission, `T_CLUB` club, `T_STUDENT_MISSION_RELATION` student_mission WHERE club_mission.`CLUB_ID` = club.`club_id` AND club_mission.`IS_DEl` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 2 AND student_mission.`STATUS` = 0 AND student_mission.`MISSION_ID` = club_mission.`mission_id` AND student_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club.`club_id` = #{clubId}

SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB_MISSION` club_mission, `T_STUDENT_MISSION_RELATION` student_mission, `T_STUDENT` student WHERE club_mission.`mission_id` = student_mission.`MISSION_ID` AND club_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND student_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 2 AND club_mission.`STATUS` = 0 AND student_mission.`IS_SIGN` = 0 AND student.`student_id` = club_mission.`SPONSOR_ID` AND student_mission.`STUDENT_ID` = #{studentId}

SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB_MISSION` club_mission, `T_SCHOOL` school, `T_CLUB` club, `T_STUDENT_MISSION_RELATION` student_mission WHERE club_mission.`CLUB_ID` = club.`club_id` AND club.`SCHOOL_ID` = school.`school_id` AND club_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 2 AND student_mission.`STATUS` = 0 AND student_mission.`MISSION_ID` = club_mission.`misstion_id` AND student_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND school.`school_id` = #{schoolId}

SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB_MISSION` club_mission, `T_STUDENT_MISSION_RELATION` student_mission, `T_STUDENT` student WHERE club_mission.`mission_id` = student_mission.`MISSION_ID` AND club_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND student_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 2 AND student.`student_id` = student_mission.`student_id` AND student_mission.`is_leader` = 1

SELECT ca.`student_id`, ca.`student_name`, ca.`avatar_url`, ca.`department_name`, ca.`job_name`, relation.`status`, relation.`is_leader`, relation.`comment`, relation.`create_date`, relation.`sign_date`, relation.`is_sign` FROM `t_student_mission_relation` relation RIGHT JOIN (SELECT mission.`mission_id`, student_mission_relation.`student_id`, student_mission_relation.`stu_mis_rel_id` FROM `t_club_mission` mission, `t_club_graduate` graduate, `t_student_mission_relation` student_mission_relation, `t_student_club_graduate_relation` student_club_relation WHERE mission.`graduate_id` = student_club_relation.`graduate_id` AND mission.`mission_id` = student_mission_relation.`mission_id` AND graduate.`club_graduate_id` = mission.`graduate_id` AND mission.`mission_id` = #{meetingId} ) missions ON missions.`mission_id` = relation.`mission_id` AND relation.`stu_mis_rel_id` = missions.`stu_mis_rel_id` AND relation.`mission_id` = #{meetingId} LEFT JOIN (SELECT graduate_relation.`stu_clu_gra_rel_id`, graduate.`club_id`, student.`student_id`, student.`real_name` AS `student_name`, student.`avatar_url`, graduate.`club_graduate_id`, graduate_relation.`department_id`, graduate_relation.`job_id`, department.`department_name`, job.`job_name` FROM `t_student_club_graduate_relation` graduate_relation, `t_club_graduate` graduate, `t_student` student, `t_club_department` department, `t_club_job` job WHERE graduate_relation.`graduate_id` = graduate.`club_graduate_id` AND student.`student_id` = graduate_relation.`student_id` AND department.`department_id` = graduate_relation.`department_id` AND job.`job_id` = graduate_relation.`job_id` GROUP BY graduate_relation.`stu_clu_gra_rel_id`) ca ON ca.`student_id` = relation.`student_id` GROUP BY relation.`stu_mis_rel_id`

SELECT * FROM `T_CLUB_MISSION` club_mission, `t_club` club WHERE club_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 2 AND club_mission.`sponsor_id` = #{sponsorId} AND club.`club_id` = club_mission.`club_id`

SELECT * FROM `t_student_mission_relation` relation, `t_club_mission` club_mission WHERE club_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 2 AND club_mission.`mission_id` = #{meetingId} AND club_mission.`mission_id` = relation.`mission_id` AND relation.`status` = 0 AND relation.`is_del` = 0

SELECT * FROM `t_student_mission_relation` relation, `t_club_mission` club_mission, `t_student` student WHERE club_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 2 AND club_mission.`mission_id` = #{meetingId} AND club_mission.`mission_id` = relation.`mission_id` AND student.`student_id` = relation.`student_id` AND relation.`is_del` = 0 ORDER BY relation.`status`

SELECT * FROM `t_student_mission_relation` relation, `t_club_mission` club_mission WHERE club_mission.`IS_DEL` = 0 AND club_mission.`TYPE` = 2 AND club_mission.`mission_id` = #{meetingId} AND club_mission.`mission_id` = relation.`mission_id` AND relation.`is_del` = 0 AND relation.`is_sign` = 1 ORDER BY relation.`status`
